seed.name: Created
seed.description: The event has been initialized but has not yet been scheduled.

seed.name: Scheduled
seed.description: The event has been scheduled and is waiting to start.

seed.name: Started
seed.description: The event has been succesfully started.

seed.name: Completed
seed.description: The event has been succesfully completed.

seed.name: Rescheduled
seed.description: The event has been rescheduled and is waiting to start.
